wikipedia_page.main: Vera Higgins (1892-1968) was a British botanist and botanical illustrator known for being an authority on succulents and cacti, particularly Crassulaceae.  Her drawings are housed at the Royal Horticultural Society.  The standard author abbreviation V.Higgins is used to indicate this person as the author when citing a botanical name.

link_mentions.page: List of botanists by author abbreviation (T–V)
